title: Planning tab: lightweight plans with notes and saved links

requirements.summary: Redesign the Planning tab UI into a simple plan title list with an in-tab plan editor for notes and saved links (no holiday stats/fields).
acceptanceCriteria: PlanningTab no longer shows holiday-specific fields (dates, participants, budget, confirmation, upcoming badges) and no longer shows the existing stats cards.
The default Planning view shows a list of plan titles with an obvious control to create a new plan using only a title input.
Clicking a plan opens a detail view/editor where the user can edit freeform notes text.
The editor includes a simple way to add/remove links and renders saved links as clickable anchors (open in a new tab).
All user-facing copy is in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the holiday-planning UI with a lightweight plans UX: (1) a title-only create control, (2) a list of plan titles, and (3) a selected-plan editor for freeform notes and saved links (add/remove + render as anchors opening in a new tab). Remove any dependency on stats cards and all holiday-specific fields/badges/copy. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Confirm the Planning tab remains wired and functional with the redesigned PlanningTab (no new tabs/routes). If any label/help text references holidays/trips/stats, update it to match the simplified Planning experience and keep copy in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update React Query hooks and frontend types for Planning to use the simplified plan model and ensure correct cache invalidation after create/update/delete.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts exposes query/mutation hooks compatible with the updated backend Planning methods.
After creating, updating, or deleting a plan, the Planning queries are invalidated/refetched so UI updates immediately without a hard refresh.
No immutable frontend paths are modified (as per SYSTEM_CONTEXT immutablePaths).

file_operations.description: Update Planning-related React Query hooks to match the simplified backend model/methods: use getPlans/addPlan/updatePlan/deletePlan and the Plan type, and remove/stop exporting hooks that depend on holiday planning stats so the Planning UI does not call them. Ensure mutations invalidate/refetch the plans query so the list and editor stay synchronized. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update PlanningTab to use the new plan hooks/types from useQueries (e.g., useGetPlans/useAddPlan/useUpdatePlan/useDeletePlan or equivalent updated exports) and rely on React Query invalidation to keep the selected-plan editor and list in sync after create/update/delete. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
